Swiggy failed to deliver my paid order and provided only a refund after a stressful, time-consuming cancellation process. There was no proactive communication from the delivery partner or the support team, and my family and guests faced unnecessary embarrassment. I have already filed a legal complaint as a consumer. This is not just about money but about accountability and respect for customers. I hope the company reviews such incidents seriously and introduces compensation policies.
